content: love a one skein one stitch project this pattern is for you if you re a beginner this easy scarf pattern is an excellent way to make a practical project while practicing your gauge and stitch work for more seasoned or intermediate crocheters this pattern is a great way to work through your yarn stash and can offer a break if you ve been working on designs that need more attention and focus it looks great in one colour but a self striping yarn is also a great option if you know how to chain and can make a half_double_crochet stitch you re set > show off your beautiful crochet > projects in the sweet bee crochet > facebook group click here 1 **materials needed ** - one cake of lion brand mandala ombre - 5mm hook - yarn needle - scissors - measuring tape 1 https //www facebook com/groups/sweetbeecrochet
